prompt: Create a workflow that checks if an API response status is 200. If true, send a success Slack message. If false, send an error notification.
Build a workflow that validates incoming data. If valid, format it, enrich it with additional details, and save to a database. If invalid, log the error.
Create a workflow that branches based on order status. If paid, process the payment. If unpaid, send a reminder. Both branches should merge and send a confirmation email.

Build a workflow that checks if a user is premium. Premium users get enhanced processing with API enrichment, standard users get basic processing. Both paths should merge to send a personalized response based on what processing was done.
Create a workflow that routes incoming webhooks based on event type: 'create' goes to a creation handler, 'update' goes to an update handler, and 'delete' goes to a deletion handler.

Build a workflow that routes support tickets based on priority. Urgent tickets escalate immediately, high priority notifies the manager, normal gets queued, low is archived for later, and unknown priorities go to a triage team.

Create a workflow that handles different payment types. Credit card payments need fraud check then processing. Bank transfers need validation then processing. Crypto needs conversion then processing. Cash payments just log directly.
Build a workflow that fetches data from two different APIs in parallel, merges the results, and then processes the combined data.
Create a workflow that gathers information from three sources in parallel: a weather API, a news API, and a stock API. Merge all results and generate a daily summary.
Build a workflow where the trigger fans out to three parallel processors: one for images, one for text, and one for metadata. All three merge back together for final assembly.
Create a workflow that fetches 1000 records from a database, processes them in batches of 50 (calling an external API for each), and then aggregates the results.
Build a workflow that reads a list of email addresses, sends personalized emails in batches of 10 to avoid rate limits, and tracks which emails were sent successfully.
Create a workflow that checks if an order total exceeds $100. For high-value orders, split the items into batches of 5 for premium processing. For standard orders, process all items in bulk.
Build a workflow that routes documents by type (invoice, receipt, contract). Each type has its own processing chain. All processed documents merge together for archival.
Create a workflow that fetches data from 2 APIs in parallel. After merging, check if the combined data is complete. If yes, process and save. If no, send an alert.
Build a simple AI assistant workflow with a manual trigger and an AI agent that can answer questions using an OpenAI model.
Create an AI workflow where the agent has access to a calculator tool and a web search tool to help answer user questions.

Build an order processing workflow: receive webhook, validate order data (if invalid, reject), check inventory (use switch for in-stock, backorder, or out-of-stock paths), process payment, and send confirmation. All paths should eventually merge to update order status.
Create a data pipeline that: fetches data from 3 APIs in parallel, merges results, validates completeness, processes valid data in batches of 25, and generates a final report.
